item.title: OSINT Resources I
item.description: OverView üïµÔ∏è OSINT Tools for gathering information and actions forensic üïµÔ∏è üïµÔ∏è Collection of 4000+ OSINT resources https://metaosint.github.io/table/ SpiderFoot automates OSINT for threat intelligence and mapping your attack surface. https://github.com/smicallef/spiderfoot Hayabusa Hayabusa is a sigma-based threat hunting and fast forensics timeline generator for Windows event logs written in Rust. : https://github.com/Yamato-Security/hayabusa Awesome forensics A curated list of awesome forensic analysis tools and resources. : https://github.com/patronuscode/awesome-forensics MVT MVT (Mobile Verification Toolkit) helps with conducting forensics of mobile devices in order to find signs of a potential compromise.
